languages.text: "Интригую? Какой интересный оборот речи". {n}Маражай наклоняется еще ближе и протягивает к вам руку, беря вас за подбородок несколькими когтистыми пальцами.{/n} "Ты не страшишься меня, а... заинтригован{mf||а}? Что ж. Возможно, я снизойду до того, чтобы удовлетворить твое любопытство. Если ты будешь подобающе покор{mf|ен|на}".

"I intrigue you? An interesting turn of phrase." {n}Marazhai leans even closer and reaches toward you, grasping your chin with his clawed fingers.{/n} "You are not afraid of me, but... intrigued by me? Well. Perhaps I will deign to satisfy your curiosity. If you submit to me."
languages.original_text: "Интригую? Какой интересный оборот речи". {n}Маражай наклоняется еще ближе и протягивает к вам руку, беря вас за подбородок несколькими когтистыми пальцами.{/n} "Ты не страшишься меня, а... заинтригован{mf||а}? Что ж. Возможно, я снизойду до того, чтобы удовлетворить твое любопытство. Если ты будешь подобающе покор{mf|ен|на}".

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «¿Te resulto intrigante? Una forma curiosa de expresarte». {n}Marazhai se acerca aún más y sujeta tu barbilla con sus garras.{/n} «¿No sientes miedo... sino intriga? Bueno. Tal vez me digne a satisfacer tu curiosidad. Si te sometes a mí».
languages.original_text: "I intrigue you? An interesting turn of phrase." {n}Marazhai leans even closer and reaches toward you, grasping your chin with his clawed fingers.{/n} "You are not afraid of me, but... intrigued by me? Well. Perhaps I will deign to satisfy your curiosity. If you submit to me."

traits.locale_text: «¿Te resulto intrigante? Una forma curiosa de expresarte». {n}Marazhai se acerca aún más y sujeta tu barbilla con sus garras.{/n} «¿No sientes miedo... sino intriga? Bueno. Tal vez me digne a satisfacer tu curiosidad. Si te sometes a mí».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “你对我很感兴趣？这可真是太有趣了。”{n}玛拉斋靠得更近了，伸出手，用带着利爪的手指捏住了你的下巴。{/n}“你不仅不怕我，还……对我很感兴趣？好吧，如果你肯听从我的话，或许我也可以将就将就，满足一下你的好奇心。”
languages.original_text: "I intrigue you? An interesting turn of phrase." {n}Marazhai leans even closer and reaches toward you, grasping your chin with his clawed fingers.{/n} "You are not afraid of me, but... intrigued by me? Well. Perhaps I will deign to satisfy your curiosity. If you submit to me."

traits.locale_text: “你对我很感兴趣？这可真是太有趣了。”{n}玛拉斋靠得更近了，伸出手，用带着利爪的手指捏住了你的下巴。{/n}“你不仅不怕我，还……对我很感兴趣？好吧，如果你肯听从我的话，或许我也可以将就将就，满足一下你的好奇心。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「興味深いだと？面白い言い方だな」{n}マラズハイはさらにあなたに身を寄せて手を伸ばし、その爪の長い指であなたの顎をつかむ。{/n}「俺のことを恐れてはいない…だが興味はある？なるほど。おそらく俺はお前の好奇心を満足させることができるだろう。お前が俺に服従すると言うのならな」
languages.original_text: "I intrigue you? An interesting turn of phrase." {n}Marazhai leans even closer and reaches toward you, grasping your chin with his clawed fingers.{/n} "You are not afraid of me, but... intrigued by me? Well. Perhaps I will deign to satisfy your curiosity. If you submit to me."

traits.locale_text: 「興味深いだと？面白い言い方だな」{n}マラズハイはさらにあなたに身を寄せて手を伸ばし、その爪の長い指であなたの顎をつかむ。{/n}「俺のことを恐れてはいない…だが興味はある？なるほど。おそらく俺はお前の好奇心を満足させることができるだろう。お前が俺に服従すると言うのならな」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Je vous intrigue, vous dites ? Voilà une bien curieuse façon de présenter les choses. » {n}Marazhai se penche encore plus près et tend une main vers vous, saisissant votre menton entre ses doigts griffus.{/n} « Est-ce à dire que vous n'avez pas peur de moi ? Allons bon. Peut-être daignerai-je satisfaire votre curiosité... à condition que vous m'obéissiez à la lettre. »
languages.original_text: "I intrigue you? An interesting turn of phrase." {n}Marazhai leans even closer and reaches toward you, grasping your chin with his clawed fingers.{/n} "You are not afraid of me, but... intrigued by me? Well. Perhaps I will deign to satisfy your curiosity. If you submit to me."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous intrigue, vous dites ? Voilà une bien curieuse façon de présenter les choses. » {n}Marazhai se penche encore plus près et tend une main vers vous, saisissant votre menton entre ses doigts griffus.{/n} « Est-ce à dire que vous n'avez pas peur de moi ? Allons bon. Peut-être daignerai-je satisfaire votre curiosité... à condition que vous m'obéissiez à la lettre. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ich fasziniere Euch? Eine interessante Formulierung." {n}Marazhai beugt sich noch näher zu dir heran, streckt die Hand nach dir aus und packt mit seinen krallenbewehrten Fingern dein Kinn.{/n} "Ihr habt keine Angst vor mir, sondern seid ... fasziniert? Nun. Vielleicht lasse ich mich dazu herab, Eure Neugier zu befriedigen. Wenn Ihr Euch mir unterwerft."
languages.original_text: "I intrigue you? An interesting turn of phrase." {n}Marazhai leans even closer and reaches toward you, grasping your chin with his clawed fingers.{/n} "You are not afraid of me, but... intrigued by me? Well. Perhaps I will deign to satisfy your curiosity. If you submit to me."

Nun. Vielleicht lasse ich mich dazu herab, Eure Neugier zu befriedigen. Wenn Ihr Euch mir unterwerft."

An interesting turn of phrase." {n}Marazhai leans even closer and reaches toward you, grasping your chin with his clawed fingers.{/n} "You are not afraid of me, but... intrigued by me? Well. Perhaps I will deign to satisfy your curiosity. If you submit to me."

languages.text: "İlgini mi çekiyorum? Ne enteresan bir üslup." {n}Marazhai daha da eğilip sana uzanıyor. Sivri parmaklarıyla çeneni tutuyor.{/n} "Benden korkmuyorsun da... İlginç buluyorsun ha? Belki de merakını giderebilirim. Kendini bana bırakırsan tabii."
languages.original_text: "I intrigue you? Perhaps I will deign to satisfy your curiosity. If you submit to me."
